104-10074-10090 2025 RELEASE UNDER THE PRESIDENT JOHN F. KENNEDY ASSASSINATION RECORDS ACT OF 1992 UNCLASSIFIED.  UNIT ALY CONFID. IIAL SECRET ROUTING AND RECORD SHEET SUBJECT: ( Optional)  Stephen Van Cleave REFERENCE:  Teleco nAmes/ Pang burn, 8 April 1974 FROM:  William D. Pang burn, Atlanta RO EXTENSION NO.  ATL- 53-74 Washington Field Office DATE 9 April 1974 TO: ( Order designation, room number, and DATE OFFICER' S COMMENTS( Number each comment to show from whom'building.  IN IT ALS to whom.  Draw a line across column after each comment. )  RECEIVED FORWARD E Attacked is the subject tape Attn:  OSS( E ames)  to use as you see fit y 2.  3.  4.  5.  6.  7.  8.  RETURN TO CIA Background Use Only Do Not Reproductions 10.  11.  12.  13.  14.  15.  E 2 IMP DET CL BY 010650 610 U CE PREVIOUS SECRET IN TERNAL UNCLASSIFIED 3-32 EDITIONS USE ONLY


14-00000
CONFIDENTIAL
OSS-495-74
13 March 1974
MEMORANDUM FOR THE RECORD
SUBJECT: Mr. Stephen Van Cleave
